Articles.Content:
> 
> Sorry folks, had to remove the image links. There were too many large images causing the page to take FOREVER to download. I pity anyone that tried to view this page on a smartphone.
> 
> cBBp, you can add the images back in but please use thumbnails and link to the large images. 
> 
> Cheers!
> 
> Capt\'n Skunky
> 
> KSP Community Manager

>

Awesome pictures!

Some of those cockpit close-ups are just asking for someone to photoshop a kerbal peaking through those windows.

> 
> Awesome pictures!
> 
> Some of those cockpit close-ups are just asking for someone to photoshop a kerbal peaking through those windows.

if someone wants to do that i have 4000 by 3000 image originals they can use.

WHOA.

Please put those inside spoiler tags, there are far too many to render at once on a page like this; I suggets breaking them up into 3 or 4 different spoilers so people can see a few at a time.

(Edit: They are cool, though ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) )
Hm, when I went the lights weren\'t there and canadarm was in the restoration area. Glad to see they are making improvements.
Wow. I can\'t believe that could actually GLIDE to a landing. It explains why they land so fast pointing up 30 degrees!

Sorry folks, had to remove the image links. There were too many large images causing the page to take FOREVER to download. I pity anyone that tried to view this page on a smartphone.

cBBp, you can add the images back in but please use thumbnails and link to the large images. 

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

> 
> Sorry folks, had to remove the image links. There were too many large images causing the page to take FOREVER to download. I pity anyone that tried to view this page on a smartphone.
> 
> cBBp, you can add the images back in but please use thumbnails and link to the large images. 
> 
> Cheers!
> 
> Capt\'n Skunky
> 
> KSP Community Manager

uh.. no fuzzy smart phones. I have seen no complaints about image size. Why can people post hundreds of images in mission threads but my shuttle pictures get removed. bull dookey. 

not adding them back either. no pictures for KSp community. peace.

> 
> uh.. no fuck smart phones. 
> 
> not adding them back either. peace.

I WANT TO SEE THEM.

> 
> I WANT TO SEE THEM.

complain to the mod that removed them. not me.

> 
> complain to the mod that removed them. not me.

But i like skunky...
oh well no pictures for you.

Good thing I saved all the URL\'s so I can post them as links instead of inline images. 

Sorry about all the trouble, but they WERE 4000 pixels wide...

> 
> Good thing I saved all the URL\'s so I can post them as links instead of inline images. 
> 
> Sorry about all the trouble, but they WERE 4000 pixels wide...

no. they are 1800 wide. I have 4000 wide ones on my computer for those that requested them and ksp forum auto re sizes to smaller. now instead of waiting for one page to load you have to wait for 52 separate pages to load. makes perfect sense. 

but i am glad someone reposted them. Thanks. real pain to paste and change 52 links you know.

It is my understanding that the forum software downloads the full image to your computer in order to re-size it. 

Now instead of having 52 images at half a meg each loading in the browser from your dropbox account every time a person hits refresh, people can load one image at a time.

I apologize for the less then graceful handling of this. We try our best but we are only human. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
placed socket7\'s post in first post.

cBBp,

I didn\'t remove your post, all I did was remove the images. It took me almost 5 minutes to get the page loaded up before I could even edit it you had so many large photos. While this may not be a concern for you, we have to consider the lowest common denominator. Not everyone has super fast connections like you.

Have pity on your fellow forum users and don\'t make them download so many images at once in a forum post. 

Also, the next time you post a foul mouthed rant like the one I just now edited above, you will be getting a formal warning. That was uncalled for.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Thanks for the pics, cbbp! Sorry that the drama happened in this post and distracted from the awesome pics.

I live in the area but hadn\'t gone out to see it yet. I\'ve got relatives coming in July and was waiting until then.

I\'d already seen Enterprise when it was there, and figured that they wouldn\'t set it up to have access to the interior, which would be the only truly awesome thing to see that would be different than seeing the various mock-ups I\'ve been in and Enterprise.

I\'m just glad I got to see one (Atlantis) launch a few years back before they retired them.

and where is the consideration for me? do you know how fun it is to copy and paste 52 links & resize 52 pictures? you removed the pictures but you could have just as easily removed the image tags or put in spoiler tags if you ask me. and I think i reserve the right to be upset. here I am trying to show my fellow space nuts something that they most likely will not see or not see for a very long time and you delete the links and all which took quite some time to put in the post. but eh. whatever it is resolved now. egotistical people never work well with other egotistical people ^^ 

in anycase. I am glad you who wish to see them enjoyed them. if you are ever in the area i suggest you stop by as it is much more amazing in person being 2 feet away from it. ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D

I asked you to do it yourself and you didn\'t.

You don\'t seriously expect the moderators to do the work of fixing your posts for you, do you? Capn didn\'t post so many images that you were locking up browsers.. you did, so why should he have done the work?

> 
> and where is the consideration for me? do you know how fun it is to copy and paste 52 links & resize 52 pictures? you removed the pictures but you could have just as easily removed the image tags or put in spoiler tags if you ask me. and I think i reserve the right to be upset. here I am trying to show my fellow space nuts something that they most likely will not see or not see for a very long time and you delete the links and all which took quite some time to put in the post.

You were happy to linkify them on facepunch when asked by the mods. 

The fact is I copy and pasted your list of links from there to here. 

It took me all of 1 minute. text is automatically linkified.

This is not FP. 

and how did you copy paste them if when you got to edit a post in Fp it shows up as the picture in the modify window (thus making it impossible to get the link again) 

Edit: lol oh it doesn\'t do that in quote window... interesting. 

as for my distain for \'linkifying\' them. when i made the FP thread I didn\'t think anyone would complain. but they did. so i did the work twice wish i knew about quote not showing the pictures. I also posted it here. Fp complained and merely did the work again. no one complained here. went to work. came home and that was gone. wasn\'t going to do it a third time. as for a mod editing the post. sure why not? they could just paste it into notepad and replace all. Cap had the links when he did it. him deleting them nullified my ability to get the links. (though now i can since Fp qoute function would get them unlike modify. :/ ) 

anyway it hardly matters apologies have already been given. back to the pictures ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
